001package xjtlu.cpt111.assignment.quiz.model;
002
003/**
004 * Model for representing option in a question.
005 * 
006 * @author H.-P. Lam, Xi'an Jiaotong-Liverpool University (XJTLU)
007 * @since 2024.09.10
008 * @since version 0.0.1
009 * @version Last modified: 2024.09.10
010 */
011public class Option {
012
013        /**
014         * Create a new instance of an option with the information specified
015         * 
016         * @param answer          answer string
017         * @param isCorrectAnswer true if the option is a correct answer; false
018         *                        otherwise
019         * @return an instance of option with the information provided
020         */
021        public static final Option newInstance(String answer, boolean isCorrectAnswer) {
022                return new Option(answer, isCorrectAnswer);
023        }
024
025        /**
026         * Answer string
027         */
028        private String answer;
029
030        /**
031         * Whether the current option is a correct answer
032         */
033        private boolean isCorrectAnswer;
034
035        /**
036         * Construct an option with the answer string provided
037         * 
038         * @param answer answer string
039         */
040        public Option(String answer) {
041                this(answer, false);
042        }
043
044        /**
045         * 
046         * Construct an option with the answer string provided
047         * 
048         * @param answer          answer string
049         * @param isCorrectAnswer true if the option is a correct answer; false
050         *                        otherwise
051         */
052        public Option(String answer, boolean isCorrectAnswer) {
053                setAnswer(answer);
054                setCorrectAnswer(isCorrectAnswer);
055        }
056
057        /**
058         * Return the option answer as string
059         * 
060         * @return option answer string
061         */
062        public String getAnswer() {
063                return answer;
064        }
065
066        /**
067         * Set the option answer
068         * 
069         * @param answer option answer
070         */
071        public void setAnswer(String answer) {
072                if (null == answer || answer.isBlank())
073                        throw new IllegalArgumentException("Answer is null or empty!");
074                this.answer = answer;
075        }
076
077        /**
078         * Return whether the current option is a correct answer
079         * 
080         * @return true if the option is a correct answer; false otherwise
081         */
082        public boolean isCorrectAnswer() {
083                return isCorrectAnswer;
084        }
085
086        /**
087         * Set whether the current option is a correct answer
088         * 
089         * @param isCorrectAnswer whether the current option is a correct answer
090         */
091        public void setCorrectAnswer(boolean isCorrectAnswer) {
092                this.isCorrectAnswer = isCorrectAnswer;
093        }
094
095        /**
096         * A string representation of the option
097         * 
098         * @param prefix prefix string to be added
099         * @return String representation of the option
100         */
101        public String toString(String prefix) {
102                StringBuilder sb = new StringBuilder();
103                if (!(null == prefix || prefix.isBlank()))
104                        sb.append(prefix.strip());
105                if (isCorrectAnswer) {
106                        if (!sb.isEmpty())
107                                sb.append(",");
108                        sb.append("correctAnswer");
109                        // sb.append("correctAnswer=").append(isCorrectAnswer);
110                }
111                if (!sb.isEmpty())
112                        sb.insert(0, "[").append("] ");
113                sb.append(answer);
114                return sb.toString();
115        }
116
117        @Override
118        public String toString() {
119                return toString("");
120        }
121}
